creator: Secure Learning Pvt Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Empowering & Adding Capacity to Teachers for Rawal Public School
An anytime, anywhere teacher assistant.
Rawal Public Guru app is an App designed by teachers, for teachers.

Rawal Public Guru app will help teachers plan lessons, share best practices,
bounce ideas off each other, introspect and improve. The app houses some very
important elements of a teacher’s daily transaction such as weekly teaching plans,
teacher resources, reflections, teacher training and classroom observations.
Planning: The weekly teaching plans on LIL4Teacher is designed specifically to
provide teachers an insight into LIL unique pedagogy and lesson delivery.
Each lesson plan is provided with instructional design, content, quizzes, resources and worksheets.
Teachers can not only write their reflections for each lesson but also rate the lesson plan. Every feedback shared would contribute to improving the pedagogy.
Teacher contributions: One of the most powerful options on Rawal Public Guru App is the teacher learning resources. While grade specific and content specific resources are tagged to the content, teachers can also record and upload videos of how they teach in class.
Professional Development: On Rawal Public Guru app, teacher professional development can happen anywhere and at any time. The app has professional development tagged to the six competencies at Schooland teachers can initiate their training at their convenience.

Sharing ideas: Teachers can record and share best practices across all
using the Rawal Public Guru App. These resources can be in the form of online videos, a very effective classroom lesson or a micro-lesson. Such resources will help in improving the teaching – learning process across all schools.

Introspection and Improvement: On Rawal Public Guru App, teachers can invite their peers to observe their lessons and give constructive and positive feedback. This is one of the most important tools in professional development. Formal classroom observations can also be conducted on the Rawal Public Guru app. Now no more paperwork, scanning and uploading of forms. All this can be done at the click of a button.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added Periodic Assessment and Summative Assessment as examination functionality
- Added option to add, view and publish exam marks and report for students
- Added option to view Active/Inactive student report
- Now Teacher can view Student's LRPAX from dashboard as well
- Now Teacher can read Blogs and can comment on them as well
- Overall App optimisation and performance improvements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Enhanced and improved Teacher Workspace, added feature to manage and publish the Teacher Aids, Homework Worksheets and Projects
- Made duration and max marks optional in Teacher Workspace
- Made Answer sheet optional for Homework Worksheet in Teacher Workspace
- Now user can also attach image in Teacher Workspace
- Added option to select topic and subtopics before starting Online Class if not available while creating
- Added assigned by name in assignment detail
- Overall App optimisation
